*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Bexar, March 21, 1832. Politics. Mexican attitude toward the colonies. Bowie. Authorities interested in the two cannon at Brazoria. Must avoid imprudence there. Union with Mexico the best course for Texas. Retail law. Land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex.]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-21-1832">March 21 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir*/p*
*p*I leave tomorrow for *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*. There is nothing very important here from the interior. The *person_mentioned*Sabios */person_mentioned*of this place are very doubtfull that *person_mentioned*Santana */person_mentioned*will fail, except one, he thinks he will succeed—this one is *person_mentioned*Erasmo [Seguin],*/person_mentioned* who expresses the same decided republican principles now, that he did many years ago, and I believe is the same warm friend to colonization and to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*that he was at first.*/p*
*p*Personal feelings are more violent here now, than ever, I mean amongst each other. I am told that the *person_mentioned*Ayto*/person_mentioned*. here will support the memorial, but they think that they ought to have been consulted first and that even now if they do anything, it ought to bear a date anterior to the memorial from there, so as to make it appear that *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*was the *location_mentioned*Movil*/location_mentioned*, and then the other *person_mentioned*Aytos*/person_mentioned*. should follow in its wake.*/p*
*p*I have agreed to this idea and assured them that nothing should be said about it, you will therefore keep this part of the letter entirely to yourself.*/p*
*p*A great deal of pains has been taken by some one to foment discord between *person_mentioned*Bowie */person_mentioned*and his connections and me, one of them has told me who he thinks it is—he thinks him to be an aspiring man, an *person_mentioned*enemy */person_mentioned*at least to both *person_mentioned*Bowie */person_mentioned*and myself— I care not much about such matters. I shall soon be clear of all this stuff and of public matters I hope.*/p*
*p*An order has gone on to inquire how the two cannon came to be at *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*etc. This thing should be managed very prudently. The facts as to how they came into the country should be clearly stated, that is—The Steam boat Ariel had them on board on the *location_mentioned*rio grande*/location_mentioned*. This boat started from that river for *location_mentioned*Orleans */location_mentioned*and put into the *location_mentioned*Brazos river*/location_mentioned* for wood, and after taking in the wood it was found necessary to lighten her as much as possible to get over the bar again, and those two guns and other things were left for that purpose; that, notwithstanding this, the boat stuck on a bar and was damaged so much that she was finally lost in*location_mentioned* Galveston bay */location_mentioned*etc. etc.*/p*
*p*It would be best to sell those two guns to *person_mentioned*Bradburn */person_mentioned*as he requested—they will do more harm than good in their present situation—or they might be delivered to the *person_mentioned*custom house officer*/person_mentioned* that has gone to *location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*The best *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned* we have in this place are alarmed lest there should be some imprudent act committed at *location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned*, which will put the *person_mentioned*colonists */person_mentioned*in the wrong, and afford a pretext to harrass them, and also defeat the memorial. They think that if any such imprudence is committed, it will turn the *person_mentioned*Santana party*/person_mentioned* against the colonizing system and make them *person_mentioned*enemies*/person_mentioned*—but if no imprudence is committed they think the memorial will succeed, even with the *person_mentioned*present administration*/person_mentioned*, and certain if *person_mentioned*Santana */person_mentioned*gets up. This is also my opinion. There is over 1000 *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, and over 700 in *location_mentioned*Matamoros*/location_mentioned*, and a large *person_mentioned*garrison */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Tampico*/location_mentioned*. This force can all be thrown into *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*by *location_mentioned*water*/location_mentioned*, in a few days, besides the *person_mentioned*militia */person_mentioned*of the*location_mentioned* adjoining states*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*If things can be kept quiet in the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*all will end right and prosperously, of this I have no doubt—what is needed there is a dead calm. All reflecting *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*will become convinced that the true interest of *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*is never to separate from *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, and that it is the true interest of this *location_mentioned*nation */location_mentioned*to encourage the population of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, and make a *location_mentioned*state */location_mentioned*of it. This being the case the *person_mentioned*govt*/person_mentioned*, will remove the restrictions and the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*will prosper.*/p*
*p*We have already seen what a check, even the rumor of difficulties in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*has given to emigration. If difficulties should arise in reality, there would be no emigration at all, and many would leave the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, and the *person_mentioned*indians */person_mentioned*would take possession of it*/p*.
*p*The news from *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*says that the retail law has put all in confusion there— it had not passed, but was still pending— the *person_mentioned*Govr*/person_mentioned*. had refused to sanction it on the ground that it was unconstitutional-— he is right. XXX[Image of hand pointing did not transfer, substituted with XXX- DML] I understand that the *person_mentioned*officers */person_mentioned*sent on from *location_mentioned*Matamoros */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*prisoners*/person_mentioned*, are to be sent to *person_mentioned*Tenoxticlan*/person_mentioned*, should they come into the *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*, they will be treated kindly and with hospitality, of course—very kindly—also the *person_mentioned*officers */person_mentioned*from the *location_mentioned*La Baca Station*/location_mentioned*. I saw them at *location_mentioned*La Bahia—*/location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Chovel */person_mentioned*is *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*in full—the others have no confidence in *person_mentioned*Chovel*/person_mentioned*, as I suspect. I wrote you by the last mail from *location_mentioned*La Bahia*/location_mentioned* which I hope you received.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Navarro */person_mentioned*has mil congojas about the*location_mentioned* land sold to *person_mentioned*Royall*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*—he first petitioned to take it in my *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*, then wrote to the govr for authority to take it in *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Dewitt*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned*, and that the *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*should be authorized to give the possession. He now says that he cannot request the *person_mentioned*Govr */person_mentioned*to appoint a new *person_mentioned*comr */person_mentioned*to put him in possession on the*location_mentioned* west of the colorado*/location_mentioned*, for it will make him appear ridiculous in the eyes of the govt. to be changing about so often. My advise to *person_mentioned*Royall */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Caldwell */person_mentioned*is to take it in *location_mentioned*Dewitts Colony */location_mentioned*and finish the thing at once-—or if any place can be found in my *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*that will not interfere, let him take it there, and finish the matter at once. They must recollect that this purchase is in the eyes of the law totally void and of no effect untill they are in a situation to hold land by purchase legally in their own names, and untill the possession is legally given, and a transfer from *person_mentioned*Navarro*/person_mentioned*—and for this reason they run the risk of loosing all by delay and by being too particular—the best plan is to take it in *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*De Witt*/person_mentioned*s Colony*/location_mentioned* as was at first intended.*/p*
*p*There is a project before the *person_mentioned*legislature*/person_mentioned*, as I am told, to reform the colonization law, so that no time is to be lost in closing the titles as soon as possible. I have not seen the plan, but it is said to be almost a total change. Keep this matter in view so as to be ready for it—but say nothing about it for the report toay not be true. *person_mentioned*John Brown's widow*/person_mentioned* spoke to me here about the *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*granted to her *person_mentioned*husband */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*on the West side of Carankawy.*/location_mentioned* He settled on it and has a considerable improvement which is now in cultivation. I believe the title is finished but the copy not delivered. See to this and finish it.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*D. Gaspar*/person_mentioned* sends mil memorias and says I must write to you in conjunction with him that you must not " por ningún motivo separarse de sus destinos." *person_mentioned*Arciniega */person_mentioned*will return early in *date_mentioned n="04-xx-832">April*/date_mentioned*—be ready to go above and finish that *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mrs. Brown*/person_mentioned*, the *person_mentioned*widow of John Brown */person_mentioned*will send for the deed of the league on *location_mentioned*Carancahua bayou*/location_mentioned*, send it to her by a safe conveyance. She leaves here *date_mentioned n="03-21-1832">today */date_mentioned*for *location_mentioned*Gonzales*/location_mentioned*, where she will remain for the present—her stock is on the *location_mentioned*league*/location_mentioned*—it is the *location_mentioned*first below the two quarters below *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Coleman*/person_mentioned*'s*/location_mentioned**/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Tell *person_mentioned*sister Emily*/person_mentioned* that *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*is very well and pleased with his journey.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. A*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* Mr. Samuel M. Williams */person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr. Mitchel */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*K B. Send *person_mentioned*Padilla*/person_mentioned*'s Solicitud by first mail—I forgot it—it is for a lot in *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned*—it is with the power of attorney.*/p*
*p*otra—*person_mentioned*Powers */person_mentioned*will go on now with his *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*, all difficulties are removed—he will settle it rapidly and add very much to the population of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. There is no doubt of this.*/p*
*/div1*
